title: Your mouth
creator_credit: World Wide Pictures, Lever Brothers Co. and Charles Smith
brief_description: Examines many aspects of the development of the human mouth: growth of teeth; the function of gums, tongue, lips, muscles, nerves and periodontal membrane; and the protective function of saliva. Explains the relation of the mouth to the exercise of taste and smell and the process of human speech.
